How to report a bug

We recommend you to post bug reports and wish lists on GitHub Issue for faster response. It also helps other users. When you post, please follow the following format.

Please check an example issue.

## Problem summary (required):

## Environment information (required):
* Your OS
* R version
* keyATM version

## Actual output (required):
Please wrap output with triple backticks.

## Expected output (it helps us a lot):
Please wrap output with triple backticks.

## Minimal and reproducible example with less than 50 lines (it helps us a lot):
Please wrap your code with triple backticks.
